author: Laura Wagner, Tim Marchman
title: Unlicensed Dermatologist Suggests People Throw Coronavirus Parties
description: The Federalist published a random businessman’s plan to deliberately infect people in the name of economic growth.
content: A Portland dermatologist named Doug Perednia who is, according to state records, not currently licensed to practice medicine in Oregon has published a plan calling for people to be voluntarily infected with the coronavirus in order to foster herd immunity and… [+3495 chars]
